sections.title: CheatSheet
sections.description: The main object for creating the cheatsheet.

params.name: config
params.description: The configuration object for this cheat sheet.

params.name: element
params.description: The DOM element in which the cheatsheet should get rendered into

sections.title: CheatSheet.Section
sections.description: A section within the cheatsheet. This should be a conceptual section.

items.title: .headerHTML()
items.description: Returns the HTML text for the header of a section

items.title: .contentHTML()
items.description: Returns the HTML text for the inner content of the section

items.title: .footerHTML()
items.description: Returns the HTML text for the footer of a section

sections.title: CheatSheet.Item
sections.description: A line item within a section

items.title: .headerHTML()
items.description: Returns the HTML text for the header of the item

items.title: .contentHTML()
items.description: Returns the HTML text for the inner content of item

items.title: .footerHTML()
items.description: Returns the HTML text for the footer of the item
